name: Hideout (Aronbt8123)
description:
Hideout was created by 4 ambitous high school students in Menntaskólinn á Ásbrú during a 5 week gamejam. It was the first time in the school's history that an online multiplayer game was made. THE GAME IS MULTIPLAYER ONLY!!

Trello Board

https://trello.com/b/7bVi2PNi/solid-clouds-gamejam

Credits

Aron Birgir Tryggvason: Lead Programmer

Stefán Ingi Víðisson: Lead Game Designer & Programmer

Styrmir Þór Wíum Sveinsson: Game Designer

Stefán Foelsche Arnarsson: Artist

Special Thanks to Kári Snær Kárason for Narrating The Game

All Assets were provided by Unity Asset Store and Mixamo.com
